item.title: 通胀风险令亚洲股市追随美国股市走势：市场综述
item.description: 美联储因通胀风险而不会在7月前再次降息的押注导致国债抛售加剧，亚洲股市将跟随美国股市走低。【原文：Stocks in Asia are set to follow US peers lower after a selloff in Treasuries deepened on bets the Federal Reserve won’t cut interest rates again before July because of inflation risks.】

item.title: 埃克森预计油价下跌将带来 7 亿美元利润损失
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp.【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. said earnings took a hit from lower crude prices and narrowing refining margins during the final three months of 2024.】

item.title: 市场对中国通缩螺旋发出警报
item.description:
投资者越来越担心，中国有可能陷入可能持续数十年的经济低迷。【原文：

Investors are increasingly concerned that China risks sliding into an economic malaise that could last decades.

】

item.title: 特朗普宣誓就职在即，债券市场瞄准 5%的美国 10 年期收益率
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）就职典礼的临近，深陷国债市场低迷的债券交易员们正准备迎接更多同样的情况，期权显示美国10年期国债收益率有可能飙升至5%；这是2023年10月以来从未见过的水平。【原文：Bond traders who have been mired in a Treasury market slump are bracing for more of the same as Donald Trump’s inauguration approaches, with options indicating the potential for a spike in US 10-year yields to 5% — a level not seen October 2023.】

item.title: 科技股飙升，"小虎队 "连续第二年获利
item.description: 已故朱利安-罗伯逊（Julian Robertson）的弟子们经营的对冲基金连续第二年实现两位数收益，继续从 2022 年的糟糕业绩中反弹。【原文：Hedge funds run by proteges of the late Julian Robertson reported a second consecutive year of double-digit gains as they continue to bounce back from a terrible 2022.】

item.title: 巴西酝酿新一轮开支削减以平息投资者担忧
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）承诺履行财政责任，但备受期待的一揽子削减计划未能缓解投资者的担忧，巴西政府正在权衡进一步削减开支的方案。【原文：Brazil’s government is weighing additional spending cuts after a much-anticipated package of reductions failed to soothe investor worries about President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s commitment to fiscal responsibility.】

item.title: 预计 2025 年新西兰房价将小幅上涨
item.description: 据新西兰核心逻辑公司（CoreLogic New Zealand）称，新西兰房价在2024年最后几个月未能对利率下降做出反应后，今年可能会出现小幅回升。【原文：New Zealand house prices may show a modest recovery this year after failing to respond to falling interest rates in the final months of 2024, according to CoreLogic New Zealand.】

item.title: 澳大利亚房价下跌幅度不大
item.description: 早上好，我是悉尼的乔吉。以下是您今天需要了解的内容。今日必读：- 澳大利亚房地产低迷可能只是昙花一现- 收购公司瞄准澳大利亚养老金体系- 对冲基金加码澳元空头押注。【原文：Good morning, it's Georgie here in Sydney. Here’s what you need to know today.Today’s must-reads:• Australia housing downturn could be short lived• Buyout firms target slice of Australia’s pensions system• Hedge funds load up on Aussie dollar short bets】

item.title: Bonaccord Capital 为最新 GP 基金募集 16 亿美元资金
item.description: 另类资产管理公司 P10 Inc. 旗下的 Bonaccord Capital Partners 为其最新基金募集了 16 亿美元，专门用于支持私募市场公司。【原文：Bonaccord Capital Partners, an arm of alternative asset manager P10 Inc., has raised $1.6 billion for its latest fund dedicated to backing private markets firms.】

item.title: Galp 首席执行官 Filipe Silva 因家庭原因辞职
item.description: Galp Energia SGPS SA 表示，Filipe Silva 因家庭原因辞去葡萄牙石油公司首席执行官一职。【原文：Galp Energia SGPS SA said Filipe Silva resigned as chief executive officer of the Portuguese oil company for family reasons.】

item.title: 英国警告深冻天气将导致电力市场紧张
item.description: 英国电网运营商发布电力市场警告称，由于风力输出下降，同时气温骤降，周三的预测供需之间没有足够的缓冲。【原文：The UK’s grid operator issued a power-market warning saying there is an insufficient buffer between predicted supply and demand on Wednesday as wind output falls at the same time as temperatures plunge.】

item.title: 比特币投资者被勒令披露 1.24 亿美元的访问密码
item.description: 上个月，一名早期比特币投资者因与加密货币销售有关的税务欺诈而被判处两年监禁，他已被勒令公开其密码，以便美国官员能够解锁目前价值约 1.24 亿美元的数字资产。【原文：An early Bitcoin investor sentenced last month to two years in prison for tax fraud related to cryptocurrency sales has been ordered to disclose his secret pass codes so US officials can unlock digital assets now valued at about $124 million.】

item.title: 经济数据推高利率，比特币跌破 10 万美元
item.description: 比特币重返 100,000 美元上方的步伐并没有持续太久。周二，由于新的经济数据导致国债收益率飙升，比特币创下两周多来的最大跌幅，与美国股市一起回落。【原文：Bitcoin’s march back above $100,000 didn’t last long. The token slid the most in more than two weeks on Tuesday, joining a retreat in US stocks, as fresh economic data sent Treasury yields soaring.】

item.title: 旧金山机场将出售 10 亿美元债券用于扩建
item.description: 旧金山国际机场正计划通过一项 10 亿美元的交易利用市政债券市场，成为其同行中最新一家寻求新资本的公司。【原文：The San Francisco International Airport is planning to tap the muni bond market with a $1 billion deal, becoming the latest among its peers to seek new capital.】

item.title: 即将上任的首席执行官称，道明将在审查中考虑施瓦布股份的命运
item.description: 多伦多道明银行（Toronto-Dominion Bank）新任首席执行官雷蒙德-秦（Raymond Chun）表示，作为该加拿大银行美国洗钱丑闻引发的战略审查的一部分，多伦多道明银行将考虑其在嘉信理财公司（Charles Schwab Corp.【原文：Toronto-Dominion Bank will consider the fate of its 10.1% stake in Charles Schwab Corp. as part of a strategic review stemming from the Canadian bank’s US money-laundering scandal, incoming Chief Executive Officer Raymond Chun said.】

item.title: 对大科技的热爱与恐惧助推 Invesco ETF 基金创下历史新高
item.description: Invesco Ltd.的ETF产品线在2024年从至少两类投资者那里吸收了创纪录的现金：一类是追逐人工智能收益的投资者，另一类是回避大科技影响的投资者。【原文：Invesco Ltd.’s ETF lineup absorbed a record amount of cash in 2024 from at least two classes of investors: those chasing AI-driven gains, and those shying away from big tech’s sway.】

item.title: 约翰-赫斯 "非常有信心 "打赢埃克森和雪佛龙合并案
item.description: 赫斯公司表示有信心在埃克森美孚公司就一个大型石油项目提起的仲裁中胜诉，该项目是雪佛龙公司 530 亿美元收购案的关键。【原文：Hess Corp. expressed confidence in prevailing in arbitration brought by Exxon Mobil Corp. over a massive oil project that’s key to the $53 billion Chevron Corp. takeover.】

item.title: 干旱来袭，拉尼娜效应令阿根廷农民大吃一惊
item.description: 两年前，拉尼娜气候模式曾给阿根廷的农场造成严重破坏，预计这次会好一些。但随着生长季节的到来，长期干旱的天气又开始出现。【原文：A La Niña weather pattern that wreaked havoc on Argentina’s farms just two years ago was expected to be kinder this time around. But as the growing season gets under way, a long bout of dry weather is emerging again.】

item.title: 特朗普称将使用 "经济力量 "使加拿大成为第 51 个国家
item.description: 听起来不再像个笑话。【原文：It no longer sounds like a joke.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称 Anthropic 正在洽谈价值 600 亿美元的融资事宜
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》报道，OpenAI 的竞争对手 Anthropic 正在就融资 20 亿美元进行深入谈判，该轮融资将使公司估值达到 600 亿美元。【原文：The OpenAI rival Anthropic is in advanced talks to raise $2 billion in a funding round that would value the company at $60 billion, according to the Wall Street Journal.】

item.title: 符号将显示联网设备的网络安全状况
item.description: 据美国官员称，消费者可能很快就能买到贴有 "网络安全 "标签的电子产品。【原文：Consumers may soon be able to buy electronic products with a label indicating they are “cyber secure,” according to US officials.】

item.title: 股价下跌，英伟达交易员放弃看涨期权押注
item.description: 周二，投资者大量抛售英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Investors sold large volumes of Nvidia Corp. call options Tuesday as shares faltered after hitting the first record high since November.】

item.title: 凯雷对大型科技公司持谨慎态度，看好 "异常便宜 "的欧洲
item.description: 凯雷投资集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：The run-up in big US tech stocks is starting to look overdone, boosting the appeal of beleaguered European equities, according to Carlyle Group Inc.’s Jason Thomas.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官称很高兴与特朗普会面并向其表示祝贺
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）是人工智能热潮的中心人物，他表示已准备好会见美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump），并向即将到来的政府提供帮助。【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s Jensen Huang, the CEO at the center of the artificial intelligence boom, said he’s ready to meet US President-elect Donald Trump and offer his help to the coming administration.】

item.title: 博斯蒂克预计通胀率将下降，但警告美联储保持谨慎
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）表示，鉴于在降低通胀方面的进展参差不齐，官员们在做出政策决定时应谨慎行事，并应偏向于保持利率高位以实现物价稳定目标。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic said officials should be cautious with policy decisions given uneven progress on lowering inflation and err on the side of keeping interest rates elevated to achieve their price stability goals.】

item.title: 松下与 Anthropic 合作，力争 30% 的销售额来自人工智能
item.description: 松下控股公司首席执行官Yuki Kusumi表示，松下将在其硬件和软件业务中全面采用人工智能技术，并与该行业的领导者之一Anthropic合作，目标是在十年内将人工智能相关收入提高到30%。【原文：Panasonic Holdings Corp. will embrace artificial intelligence technology across its hardware and software businesses and team up with Anthropic, one of the leaders in the industry, with the goal of boosting AI-related revenue to 30% in a decade, Chief Executive Officer Yuki Kusumi said.】

item.title: Redburn 看涨流媒体前景，迪士尼股价上涨
item.description: 华特迪士尼公司（Walt Disney Co.【原文：Walt Disney Co. has reached a point where its streaming service can outperform its struggling television offering, according to an analyst who has become the media giant’s biggest bull.】

item.title: 消息称泰晤士河水务公司寻求投资者在下月之前提交新的投标书
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，泰晤士水务公司的潜在投资者必须在 2 月 10 日之前提交新的投标书，因为这家陷入困境的公司正在寻求紧急注资，以改善其财务状况。【原文：Potential investors in Thames Water will have to submit new bids for the water utility by Feb. 10, according to people familiar with the matter, as the beleaguered firm seeks an urgent injection of equity to boost its finances.】

item.title: 西班牙 HBX 集团据称计划最快下周启动 IPO
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，西班牙旅游技术公司 HBX 集团正在考虑最早于下周宣布首次公开募股计划，这可能是欧洲 2025 年首批大型上市企业之一。【原文：Spanish travel technology firm HBX Group is considering announcing plans for an initial public offering as early as next week, people familiar with the matter said, in what could be one of Europe’s first major listings of 2025.】

item.title: 英国特斯拉销量居欧洲首位之际，马斯克挑起斯塔默之争
item.description: 在英国成为特斯拉公司汽车在欧洲最大市场的同时，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）正在加紧抨击英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）及其新工党政府。【原文：Elon Musk is ramping up his attacks on British Prime Minister Keir Starmer and his new Labour government at the same time as the UK emerges as the largest market in Europe for Tesla Inc. vehicles.】
